      • getEditorBodyFiltered

        public static java.lang.String getEditorBodyFiltered(Site site,
                                                     java.lang.String editorKey,
                                                     java.lang.String language)
                                              throws EditorException
        Returns editor body text but strips out all HTML tags. Uses #getEditorBody(String, String, String) method to retrieve initial body text and then uses regexps to strip tags. Note that to strip all possible HTML tags batch processing is used to avoid stack overflow problems which happens when processing too huge regexp. Solution copied from AMP v2 Help+Lucene integration solution. Check AMP-9328 for more details.
        Parameters:
        siteId -
        editorKey -
        language -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        EditorException
